decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (GW-R01-EX-101 Rev.1 Received 23/08/2018 and GR-R01-EX-103; GR-R01-PR-102; GW-R01-EX-102; Email with kitchen extract ventilation system specifications. Received 02/10/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The ventilation flue hereby permitted shall be subject to regular servicing and maintenance meeting manufacturers recommended specifications. Records of such works shall be documented.

Condition : 4 - The use shall not commence until not less than three 240 litre bins have been made available on site within the area for refuse storage shown on the approved plans, together with facilities for the separation and safe storage of glass, metal, plastics, cardboard, food waste and other recyclable materials.  These bins shall be enclosed on four side sides by the existing rear wall of the building and a two-metre high close boarded fence with gates that are to be kept closed other than when access is required to access or move the bins.  The materials stored shall then be collected and taken to a suitable facility for recycling.  The storage area and bins shall be kept permanently and no waste shall be stored outside the site or other than in the identified storage area.  Non-recyclable and perishable waste shall be removed from site no less frequently than once a week.  Waste shall be removed as soon as the bins become full if this is earlier than the time of the normal collections, unless additional covered and enclosed bins have been provided and stored inside the enclosure.  These measures shall thereafter made permanently available for the on-site storage of refuse and waste.

Condition : 5 - There shall be no deliveries of food, equipment or other business materials to the premises and no collection of refuse waste or recyclable materials from the premises except between the hours of 08:00 - 22:00 Monday to Saturday and 10:00 - 18:00 on Sundays and public holidays.
Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted for A3/A5 (Restaurant/Hot Food Takeaway) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times: 11:00 to 23:00 Monday to Sunday and on Bank Holidays.

Condition : 7 - The kitchen extract system shall be provided in accordance with the details received 2 October 2018 before the use is brought into operation, and when at maximum operation shall not result in noise that is more than 10dB(A) below background noise levels for the site. No external ventilation duct shall be installed without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority
Condition : 8 - No deep fat frying shall take place at the site.
description: Change of use of from A3 to A3/A5 (restaurant/ takeaway).
